data.title: John Lucas, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: John Lucas stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
John Lucas - Points

John Lucas scores a career high 42 points (2010)

On February 24, 2010, John Lucas tied his career high in points in a China - CBA game. That day he scored 42 points in Shanghai's home win against Jiangsu, 125-121. He also had 4 rebounds, 3 assists, 3 steals. He shot 12/16 from two, 5/13 from three, shooting at 58.6% from the field. He also shot 3/4 from the free-throw line.

John Lucas - Rebounds

John Lucas grabs a career high 11 rebounds (2011)

On February 20, 2011, John Lucas tied his career high in rebounds in a China - CBA game. That day he grabbed 11 rebounds in Shanghai's road loss against Xinjiang, 108-87. He also had 6 points, 2 assists, 1 steal.

John Lucas - Assists

John Lucas gives a career high 13 assists (2014)

On December 31, 2014, John Lucas tied his career high in assists in a China - CBA game. That day he dished 13 assists in Fujian SBS's home win against Zhejiang, 125-109. He also had 25 points, 6 rebounds.

John Lucas - Steals

John Lucas has a career high 5 steals (2006)

On March 21, 2006, John Lucas tied his career high in steals in a G-League game. That day he reached 5 steals in Oklahoma City Blue's road win against Fayetteville Patriots, 106-120. He also had 13 points, 4 rebounds and 8 assists.

John Lucas - Blocks

John Lucas blocks a career high 1 shot (2005)

On November 23, 2005, John Lucas tied his career high in blocks in a G-League game. That day he went for 1 block in Oklahoma City Blue's road loss against Fort Worth Flyers, 81-80. He also had 12 points, 6 rebounds.
